content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, but I'm really sad about my breakup. How are you doing?
I'm sorry to hear that, I hope things get better for you. I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
Thanks, I appreciate that. What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing at home, watching some TV. What about you?
I'm in my last year of grad school, so I'm working on my thesis.
That sounds tough, but I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks, I hope so! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is Pretty Woman. What's yours?
Mine is 16 Candles. I love the music in that movie.
I love the music in that movie too!
I love to travel! I've been to a few countries, but I'd love to travel more.
I'd love to travel more too. I've only been to a few countries, but I've always wanted to go to Europe.
Europe is beautiful! I've been to France and Italy, and I loved both of them.
Those are two of the countries I'd love to visit! I hear they're amazing.
They are! I'm sure you'd love them.
